ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Running With Selo's
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, /follow works GREAT now!  Had a guildsis tp me to the druid ring in Butcherblock, then fired up Selo s w.drum, targetted her, typed /follow (because I
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, /follow works GREAT now! Had a guildsis tp me to the druid ring in
Butcherblock, then fired up Selo's w.drum, targetted her, typed /follow
(because I always get confused trying to find my way back to the path from
that place :oP ), and never lost track of her. Same thing for running with
a group from Innothule to EFP.

-=B=-
The Rathe
